snippet: Eric L. Adams was once known for the often incendiary curbside news conferences he held outside One Police Plaza in Lower Manhattan. Now he is the Brooklyn borough president.
abstract: Profile of Brooklyn Borough President Eric L Adams, former New York Police Dept captain known for incendiary curbside news conferences at which he assailed department brass on issues like the dearth of black officers; Adams is basking in knowledge that times, not to mention New York's mayor and police commissioner, may have pulled alongside him in fighting city's stop-and-frisk policing policy.
